sentences.english: Implement industrial chain integration of different industries for industrial equity investment.

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
